data.actual_result: Text does not ellipse and gets cut off at the end
data.expected_result: Text ellipses and is not cut off
data.short_description: Text in Address 2 option under card information gets cut off on 175 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 175 - Go to your Billing tab - Click edit on a card information - Observe the text in the Address 2 section
